message.raw: For gazebo homebrew: make WORKSPACE/gazebo a symlink to WORKSPACE/gazeboN instead of the other way around; this will fix some gazebo tests that expect some test files in specific paths and are confused by symlinks
message.html: For gazebo homebrew: make WORKSPACE/gazebo a symlink to WORKSPACE/gazeboN instead of the other way around; this will fix some gazebo tests that expect some test files in specific paths and are confused by symlinks
